name: karma-sourcemap-loader
description: Karma plugin that locates and loads existing javascript source map files.

scripts.test: c8 karma start test/karma.prefixes.js && c8 --no-clean karma start test/karma.handler.js && c8 --no-clean karma start test/karma.source-root-value.js && c8 --no-clean karma start test/karma.source-root-function.js && c8 report -r text -r lcov && c8 check-coverage --100
